parameter_description.batch_size: batch size determines the no.of images to feed the network at once eg: 16
parameter_description.nb_classes: number of classes to categorize the results eg: 3
parameter_description.img_rows: rows in the input vector eg:256
parameter_description.img_cols: columns in the input vector eg:256
parameter_description.over_sample: To increase the training data, pads more data to rare classes etc, eg: 1=1x, 2=2x data volume, (whole numbers only)
parameter_description.label_name: Pass the column name of labels being used for the model. eg: 2_class
parameter_description.sequence_length: no of images to be combined in one sequence <0 - 10> eg:4
parameter_description.balanced: whether the classes should be balanced while generating the data or not? <boolean>
parameter_description.label_mask: path to the folder** containing class label images
parameter_description.test_file: Do prediction on test, validation or train
